head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHELAN, HAROLD SIDNEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHELAN, HAROLD SIDNEY

block.p: SHELAN-Harold Sidney. On June 3, 2000, at the age of 85. Beloved husband of the late Lucille (nee Geist). Loving father of Diane and Steven Fox. Cherished grandfather of Jayson. Loving brother of Bernard and Bobby. Uncle of Jane, Harris, Michael and Scott Maslansky. Mr. Shelan attained rank of Major in the United States Army Air Corps 366th Fighter Division during World War II. Visiting hours Monday, June 5, 7-9 PM, at ''Riverside Memorial Chapel,'' 21 W. Broad St., Mt. Vernon, NY. Funeral service Tuesday, June 6, 9:30 AM, at Congregation Kol Ami, 252 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY. Contributions in Mr. Shelan's memory may be made to the Alzheimer's Association.
